title: Indian Flame Bar and Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Pizza, Indian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Owners seem to be informed and understanding about vegetarian diets and will make dishes on the menu veg upon request. Family friendly. Mainly Indian food (like curry dishes, rices, pakoras, samosas) with a few North American food like fries and pizza.
